item.title: Christianity vs. Mitt Romney - U.S. Elections 2012
item.description: Noahide Nations Ray & Adam discuss the U.S. 2012 elections and how it relates to the Noahide community. What does Romney's religion have to do with it?
item.itunes:subtitle: Ray & Adam discuss the U.S. 2012 elections and how it relates to the Noahide community. What does Romney's religion have to do with it?

item.title: Wherefore art thou, O generation of the desert?
item.description: Temple Talk Everybody has their role in serving G-d, not only the Levites. Shake it up & go!
item.itunes:subtitle: Everybody has their role in serving G-d, not only the Levites. Shake it up & go!

item.title: To Destroy, or Not to Destroy. That is the Question.
item.description: News & Call-In with Tamar Yonah PM Netanyahu pleaded with Likud lawmakers to oppose the 'regulation law' saying it would harm Israel's settlements. Really?
item.itunes:subtitle: PM Netanyahu pleaded with Likud lawmakers to oppose the 'regulation law' saying it would harm Israel's settlements. Really?

item.title: Global warming - truth or hype? And why do expats need radio?
item.description: Goldstein on Gelt The true story behind global warming, and how American expats keep in touch by radio.
item.itunes:subtitle: The true story behind global warming, and how American expats keep in touch by radio.

item.title: A Win-Win Solution For Illegal African Muslim Migrants
